TLINE.TDLINE: &USE&
The condition type groups allow the grouping of condition types. Via
condition type groups in the AD you define the condition types allowed
for a contract type which are implemented as a cluster for the contract
proof.
&PRECONDITIONS&
&STANDARD_SETUP&
&ACTIVITY&
Step1: Condition type groups
Condition type groups are created via the view cluster /GICOM/VC_CNDG.
This facilitates the creation of the assignment, because the assignment
of the condition types to the groups is directly displayed in a graphic
view.
For the assignment, create the condition type group and select the
group, to which the condition types will be assigned to. In the new
section, enter a token and the title of the condition group.
By clicking "condition type assignment" in the branch below you enter
the corresponding condition types. Only the key of the condition type
must be entered. The description of the condition types will be
transferred from the condition type customizing.
Step2: Assignment of a condition type group to a contract type
The assignment of the condition type groups to a contract type is
performed via the contract type configuration. Detailed information is
provided in Chapter 3.10.2.
